simple-value.value-expression: 1 dia de Atraso entre 1 e 4 dias de Atraso +4 dia de Atraso * Clique sobre o número único para visualizar o registro de origem

grid.expression: Select l.nuchave, l.tabela, ad_pkg_lib.nro_documento(tabela, nuchave) as nrodoc, ''||l.nuchave||'' as nrounico, i.descrinstancia as origem, l.evento||' - '||e.descricao descricao, --d.ordemcarga, ''||trunc(dhsolicit)||'' dtsolicit , us.codusu||' - '||us.nomeusu solicitante, ul.codusu||' - '||ul.nomeusu liberador, l.vlratual, l.observacao, trunc(sysdate) - trunc(dhsolicit) dias_atraso, case when trunc(sysdate) - trunc(dhsolicit) <= 1 then '#81F781' when trunc(sysdate) - trunc(dhsolicit) between 1 and 3 then '#F2F5A9' when trunc(sysdate) - trunc(dhsolicit) > 4 then '#F5A9A9' end as BKCOLOR From tsilib l Inner Join tgflibeve e On l.evento = e.nuevento Inner Join tsiusu us On l.codususolicit = us.codusu Inner Join tsiusu ul On l.codusulib = ul.codusu Inner join tddins i on i.nometab = (case when l.tabela = 'AD_MULCONT' then 'AD_MULCONTROL' else l.tabela end) and i.nuinstanciapai is null -- Inner join tddins i on i.nometab = l.tabela and i.nuinstanciapai is null -- Inner join ad_tsfdef d on d.nudef = l.nuchave Where l.dhlib is null and nvl(reprovado,'N') <> 'S' and trunc(dhsolicit) between :periodo.ini and :periodo.fin and (l.codusulib = :v_usulogado or :v_usulogado in (0,216) or :v_usulogado in (select codususupl from tsisupl sp where sp.codusu = l.codusulib and trunc(sysdate) <= sp.dtfim) ) order by dhsolicit
